summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Mary Avenue Northeast in the City of Seattle, from West 70th Street to West 75th Street, by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden cross walks thereon, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2110 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
